<title level="1" right="Rules">[Specialty Basic Actions](/Rules.aspx?ID=2344)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 418 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
These actions are useful under specific circumstances. The [Arrest a Fall](/Actions.aspx?ID=2308), [Burrow](/Actions.aspx?ID=2310), and [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=2312) actions require you to have a special [movement type](/Rules.aspx?ID=2346). The climb and swim Speeds use the corresponding actions from the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) skill.
